content: A link to confirm the operation has been sent to {{ownerEmail}} (the email address of the space owner).

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a confirmation message after sending an email to the space owner confirming portal deletion. It appears in a success toast notification that pops up when a delete or deactivation button is clicked, and it provides context for the user through placeholders for the owner's email address.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "A link to confirm the operation" is slightly awkward. "Tranzaksiyanı təsdiqləmək üçün keçid" translates more literally to 'A link to confirm the transaction'.  While understandable, it doesn't perfectly convey the intended meaning of confirming an operation or action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Tranzaksiyanın təsdiqlənməsi üçün keçid

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'domen sahibinin e-poçt ünvanı' is a literal translation of 'space owner's email address.' A more natural phrasing might be used.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: məkan sahibi e-poçt ünvanına

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is a bit literal and sounds unnatural in Czech. "Odkaz pro potvrzení operace" is clunky. A more natural phrasing would be 'Odkaz pro potvrzení smazání' or 'Potvrzovací odkaz'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Na adresu {{ownerEmail}} byl odeslán potvrzovací odkaz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "(e-mailová adresa vlastníka prostoru)" is a clarification that isn't strictly necessary and disrupts the flow. It's better to omit it or integrate it more smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Na adresu {{ownerEmail}} byl odeslán potvrzovací odkaz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'operation' is a bit vague in this context. 'Vorgang' can be translated to operation but a more specific word like 'Löschvorgang' (deletion process) would be more accurate and clearer for the user.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ein Link zur Bestätigung des Löschvorgangs wurde an {{ownerEmail}} (die E-Mail-Adresse des Raumbesitzers).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'η διεύθυνση ηλεκτρονικού ταχυδρομείου' is a bit verbose. A more concise phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ένας σύνδεσμος για την επιβεβαίωση της λειτουργίας έχει σταλεί στο {{ownerEmail}} (στο email του ιδιοκτήτη του χώρου).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "the email address of the space owner" is somewhat literal and could be more naturally translated. While technically correct, it's not as idiomatic in Spanish.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Se ha enviado un enlace para confirmar la operación a {{ownerEmail}} (la dirección de correo electrónico del propietario del espacio).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Toiminnonvahvistuslinkki on lähetetty' is a bit literal and awkward. A more natural Finnish phrasing would be 'Vahvistuslinkki on lähetetty' or 'Vahvistuslinkki on lähetetty'. The term 'Toiminnonvahvistus' is unnecessary and adds complexity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vahvistuslinkki on lähetetty

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence could flow better. Consider reordering for clarity.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Vahvistuslinkki on lähetetty {{ownerEmail}} osoitteeseen (tilan omistajan sähköpostiosoite).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'էլ.փոստի' is a shortened version of 'էլեկտրոնային փոստի' (email) and while common, using the full word is generally preferred for clarity in formal settings.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: էլեկտրոնային փոստի

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'հասցեն' (address) feels slightly redundant after 'էլեկտրոնային փոստի' or 'էլ.փոստի'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Գործողությունը հաստատող հղում է ուղարկվել {{ownerEmail}} (տարածքի սեփականատիրոջ էլեկտրոնային փոստ).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses parentheses `()` instead of a more natural Japanese way of indicating clarification. While not incorrect, it feels slightly unnatural and less fluent in Japanese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: スペース所有者のメールアドレスに操作確認用のリンクが送信されました。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation uses parenthesis around '스페이스 소유자의 이메일 주소' which might seem less natural than other formatting options. Consider using an em dash or a comma for better readability in Korean.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 작업을 확인하는 링크가 {{ownerEmail}} — 스페이스 소유자의 이메일 주소 — 로 발송되었습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'the email address of the space owner' is a bit literal and could be phrased more naturally in Lao. 'ເຈົ້າຂອງພື້ນທີ່' directly translates to 'owner of the area/space', which is accurate but might feel slightly formal in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງເພື່ອຢືນຢັນການດຳເນີນການໄດ້ຖືກສົ່ງໄປຫາ {{ownerEmail}} (ອີເມວຂອງເຈົ້າຂອງ).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Latvian translation uses parentheses after the email address. While not strictly incorrect, it's less common and slightly more formal than simply stating the email address directly. Consider removing the parentheses for a more natural flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Saite darbības apstiprināšanai ir nosūtīta uz {{ownerEmail}}, telpas īpašnieka e-pasta adresi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "operation" is not ideal. "Działanie" can be interpreted broadly. In this context, it would be better to use a more specific term like "usunięcie" (deletion) or "procedura" (procedure).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link potwierdzający usunięcie został wysłany na adres {{ownerEmail}} (adres e-mail właściciela obszaru roboczego).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the sentence structure feels a little awkward in Polish. A slight rearrangement can improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Link potwierdzający usunięcie został wysłany na adres e-mail {{ownerEmail}} właściciela obszaru roboczego.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "foi enviada" (was sent) is not the best translation for "has been sent." It implies a passive action where the email was simply sent, rather than actively dispatched. A more accurate translation would convey that the email *was dispatched* or *delivered* to the owner.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Um link para confirmar que a operação foi *despachada/enviada* para {{ownerEmail}} (o endereço de email do proprietário do espaço).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'spaţiului proprietarului' is a bit clunky and not the most natural way to express 'space owner'. A more natural translation would be 'proprietarului spaţiului' or simply 'proprietarului'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Linkul de confirmare a operaţiei a fost trimis către {{ownerEmail}} (adresa email a proprietarului spaţiului).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "A link to confirm the operation" is better translated as "Ссылка для подтверждения действия" instead of "Ссылка для подтверждения операции". 'Операция' implies a more complex action than simply confirming a deletion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ссылка для подтверждения действия была отправлена на {{ownerEmail}} (адрес электронной почты владельца).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'වි-තැපැල් ලිපිනය' is an awkward construction for 'email address'. It's a literal translation of 'post address'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙහෙයුම තහවුරු කිරීමට සබැඳියක් {{ownerEmail}} වෙත යවා ඇත (අවකාශයේ හිමිකරුගේ තැපැල් ලිපිනය).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The hyphen in 'වි-තැපැල්' is unnecessary and breaks the flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: මෙහෙයුම තහවුරු කිරීමට සබැඳියක් {{ownerEmail}} වෙත යවා ඇත (අවකාශයේ හිමිකරුගේ තැපැල් ලිපිනය).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'elektronski' is overly formal for this context. A more natural word would be 'e-poštni'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Povezava za potrditev operacije je bila poslana na {{ownerEmail}} (e-poštni naslov lastnika prostora).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation lacks a period at the end of the sentence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Линк за потврду операције је послат на {{ownerEmail}} (емаил адреса власника простора).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Link za potvrdu operacije je poslat na...' is a bit literal. A more natural phrasing would be 'Poslat je link za potvrdu operacije na...' or 'Link za potvrdu operacije poslat je na...'
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Poslat je link za potvrdu operacije na {{ownerEmail}} (email adresa vlasnika prostora).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation is overly literal and a bit awkward. The phrase 'işlemi onaylamak için bir bağlantı gönderildi' (a link has been sent to confirm the operation) is not the most natural way to express this in Turkish. A more fluent option would imply that the recipient needs to confirm the deletion.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İşlemi onaylamanızı rica etmeniz için {{ownerEmail}} adresine bir bağlantı gönderildi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, the parentheses and explanation '(alan sahibinin e-posta adresi)' are less common and feel a bit clunky. It's generally assumed the email address belongs to the owner.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: İşlemi onaylamanızı rica etmeniz için {{ownerEmail}} adresine bir bağlantı gönderildi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "địa chỉ email của chủ sở hữu không gian" is a bit verbose and slightly unnatural. A more concise and natural translation would be "email của chủ không gian".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Một liên kết để xác nhận hoạt động đã được gửi đến {{ownerEmail}} (email của chủ không gian).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The parenthesis and the clarifying phrase "(the email address of the space owner)" are not seamlessly integrated into the Chinese translation. While the meaning is conveyed, a more natural flow could improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 操作确认链接已发送至 {{ownerEmail}}（空间所有者邮箱）。
